Properties.ProtectedString:
Mouse_Icon = "rbxasset://textures/GunCursor.png" Reloading_Icon = "rbxasset://textures/GunWaitCursor.png"
Tool = script.Parent
Mouse = nil
function UpdateIcon() if Mouse then Mouse.Icon = Tool.Enabled and Mouse_Icon or Reloading_Icon end end
function OnEquipped(ToolMouse) Mouse = ToolMouse UpdateIcon() end
function OnChanged(Property) if Property == "Enabled" then UpdateIcon() end end
Tool.Equipped:connect(OnEquipped) Tool.Changed:connect(OnChanged)

--Made by Luckymaxer
Players = game:GetService("Players") Debris = game:GetService("Debris")
Tool = script.Parent Handle = Tool:WaitForChild("Handle") PlaySound = Handle:WaitForChild("PlaySound") SphereScript = Tool:WaitForChild("SphereScript") SpecialReady = Tool:WaitForChild("SpecialReady")
-- Returns a character ancestor and its Humanoid, or nil function FindCharacterAncestor(Parent) if Parent and Parent ~= game:GetService("Workspace") then local humanoid = Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if humanoid then return Parent, humanoid else return FindCharacterAncestor(Parent.Parent) end end return nil end
function MakeCircle(Diameter, Consistency, Size, Position) local Parts = {} for i = 1, 360, Consistency do local Part = Instance.new("Part") Part.FormFactor = Enum.FormFactor.Custom Part.Size = Size Part.TopSurface = Enum.SurfaceType.Smooth Part.BottomSurface = Enum.SurfaceType.Smooth Part.CFrame = CFrame.new(Position) * CFrame.Angles(0, math.rad(i), 0) * CFrame.new(0, 0, Diameter) table.insert(Parts, Part) end return Parts end
function CastLaser(StartPosition, Direction, MaxDistance, Ignore)
local function RayCast(Pos, Dir, Max, IgnoreList) return game:GetService("Workspace"):FindPartOnRayWithIgnoreList(Ray.new(Pos, Dir.unit * (Max or 999.999)), IgnoreList) end
local Hit, EndPosition = RayCast(StartPosition, Direction, MaxDistance, Ignore) local Distance = (StartPosition - EndPosition).magnitude local LaserPart = Instance.new("Part") LaserPart.Name = "Laser" LaserPart.Transparency = 0.000001 LaserPart.FormFactor = Enum.FormFactor.Custom LaserPart.TopSurface = Enum.SurfaceType.Smooth LaserPart.BottomSurface = Enum.SurfaceType.Smooth LaserPart.Material = Enum.Material.SmoothPlastic LaserPart.BrickColor = BrickColor.new("New Yeller") LaserPart.CanCollide = false LaserPart.Anchored = true LaserPart.Locked = true LaserPart.Size = Vector3.new(0.35, 0.35, Distance) local Mesh = Instance.new("SpecialMesh") Mesh.MeshType = Enum.MeshType.Brick Mesh.Scale = Vector3.new(1, 1, 1) Mesh.Parent = LaserPart Debris:AddItem(LaserPart, 1) LaserPart.Parent = Character LaserPart.CFrame = CFrame.new(StartPosition, EndPosition) * CFrame.new(0, 0, (-Distance / 2)) Spawn(function() for i = 1, 20 do wait(0.05) LaserPart.Transparency = LaserPart.Transparency + 0.05 end end)
return Hit, EndPosition
end
function Fire() if Tool.Enabled and Humanoid.Health > 0 then Tool.Enabled = false
PlaySound.Value = "22968437"
local StartingPosition = Handle.Position + Handle.CFrame.lookVector * (Handle.Size.Z / 2)
local HandleClone = Handle:Clone() local HandleCloneY = HandleClone:Clone() HandleCloneY.CFrame = HandleCloneY.CFrame * CFrame.Angles(math.rad(90), 0, 0) HandleCloneY.CFrame = HandleCloneY.CFrame + HandleCloneY.CFrame.lookVector * ((Handle.Size.Y / 2) - 0.5) local HandleCloneZ = HandleCloneY:Clone() HandleCloneZ.CFrame = HandleCloneZ.CFrame + HandleClone.CFrame.lookVector * ((HandleClone.Size.Z / 2) - 0)
local Hit, Pos = CastLaser(HandleCloneZ.CFrame.p, (Humanoid.TargetPoint - StartingPosition), 100, {Character})
local character, humanoid = FindCharacterAncestor(Hit)
if character and character.Parent and humanoid and humanoid.Parent then local creator_tag = Instance.new("ObjectValue") creator_tag.Name = "creator" creator_tag.Value = Player Debris:AddItem(creator_tag, 2) creator_tag.Parent = humanoid humanoid:TakeDamage(10) end
wait(1)
Tool.Enabled = true end end
function OnEquipped(Mouse) Character = Tool.Parent Humanoid = Character:WaitForChild("Humanoid") Torso = Character:WaitForChild("Torso") Player = Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Character) if not Tool.Enabled then wait(0.5) Tool.Enabled = true end Mouse.Button1Down:connect(function() Fire() end) Mouse.KeyDown:connect(function(Key) Key = Key:lower() if Key == "q" and SpecialReady.Value then SpecialReady.Value = false Sphere = Instance.new("Part") Sphere.Name = "Sphere" Sphere.TopSurface = Enum.SurfaceType.Smooth Sphere.BottomSurface = Enum.SurfaceType.Smooth Sphere.Material = Enum.Material.Plastic Sphere.Shape = Enum.PartType.Ball Sphere.FormFactor = Enum.FormFactor.Custom Sphere.Size = Vector3.new(6, 6, 6) Sphere.CanCollide = false Sphere.Locked = true Sphere.Transparency = 0.5 Sphere.BrickColor = BrickColor.new("Really red") Sphere.CFrame = Torso.CFrame local BodyPosition = Instance.new("BodyPosition") BodyPosition.D = 100 BodyPosition.maxForce = Vector3.new(9e+999, 9e+999, 9e+999) BodyPosition.Parent = Sphere local BodyGyro = Instance.new("BodyGyro") BodyGyro.D = 250 BodyGyro.P = 5000 BodyGyro.maxTorque = Vector3.new(0, 9e+999, 0) BodyGyro.Parent = Sphere SphereScriptClone = SphereScript:Clone() SphereScriptClone.Disabled = false Creator = Instance.new("ObjectValue") Creator.Name = "creator" Creator.Value = Player Creator.Parent = SphereScriptClone SphereScriptClone.Parent = Sphere Debris:AddItem(Sphere, 20) Sphere.Parent = Character Spawn(function() while Sphere and Sphere.Parent and BodyPosition and BodyPosition.Parent and BodyGyro and BodyGyro.Parent do BodyPosition.position = Torso.Position BodyGyro.cframe = BodyGyro.cframe * CFrame.Angles(0, 0.1, 0) wait() end end) local Parts = MakeCircle(3, 60, Vector3.new(1, 1, 1), Torso.Position) for i, v in pairs(Parts) do v.Name = "Note" v.CanCollide = false local Mesh = Instance.new("SpecialMesh") Mesh.MeshType = Enum.MeshType.FileMesh Mesh.MeshId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset?id=151980686" Mesh.TextureId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset?id=151980715" Mesh.Scale = Vector3.new(1.5, 1.5, 1.5) Mesh.Parent = v v.CFrame = CFrame.new(v.Position, Torso.Position) v.CFrame = v.CFrame * CFrame.Angles(0, math.pi / 2, 0) local CF = v.CFrame v.Parent = Sphere local Weld = Instance.new("Weld") Weld.Part0 = Sphere Weld.Part1 = v Weld.Parent = v Weld.C0 = Sphere.CFrame:inverse() Weld.C1 = CF:inverse() end end end) end
function OnUnequipped() if Sphere and Sphere.Parent then Sphere:Destroy() end end
Tool.Equipped:connect(OnEquipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(OnUnequipped)

--Made by Luckymaxer
Tool = script.Parent Handle = Tool:WaitForChild("Handle") PlaySound = Handle:WaitForChild("PlaySound")
Debris = game:GetService("Debris")
PlaySound.Changed:connect(function() if PlaySound.Value ~= "" then local SoundId = PlaySound.Value PlaySound.Value = "" local Sound = Instance.new("Sound") Sound.Looped = false Sound.Pitch = 1 Sound.SoundId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset?id=" .. SoundId Sound.PlayOnRemove = false Sound.Volume = 1 Debris:AddItem(Sound, 3) Sound.Parent = Handle wait() Sound:Play() end end)

--Made by Luckymaxer
Sphere = script.Parent
Creator = script:WaitForChild("creator")
Players = game:GetService("Players") Debris = game:GetService("Debris")
Sound = Instance.new("Sound") Sound.Looped = true Sound.Volume = 0.5 Sound.Pitch = 1 Sound.SoundId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset?id=152092907" Sound.Parent = Sphere
Sphere.Touched:connect(function(Hit) if Hit and Hit.Parent then local Humanoid = Hit.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") local Torso = Hit.Parent:FindFirstChild("Torso") local Player = Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Hit.Parent)
if ((Player and Player ~= Creator.Value) or not Player) and Humanoid and Humanoid.Health > 0 and Torso then
Humanoid.Sit = true Torso.Velocity = CFrame.new(Sphere.Position, Torso.Position).lookVector * 50
for i, v in pairs(Humanoid:GetChildren()) do if v:IsA("ObjectValue") and v.Name == "creator" then v:Destroy() end end
local creator = Creator:Clone() creator.Value = Creator.Value Debris:AddItem(creator, 2) creator.Parent = Humanoid
Humanoid:TakeDamage(10)
else
local HitName = string.lower(Hit.Name) if (HitName == "bullet" or HitName == "projectile" or HitName == "paintball" or HitName == "pellet" or HitName == "rocket") and Hit:GetMass() < Sphere:GetMass() then
if Hit and Hit.Parent then Hit:Destroy() end
end
end end end)
Sound:Play()

--Made by Luckymaxer
Tool = script.Parent Handle = Tool:WaitForChild("Handle")
SpecialReady = Tool:WaitForChild("SpecialReady")
SpecialReady.Value = true
SpecialReady.Changed:connect(function() if not SpecialReady.Value then wait(40) SpecialReady.Value = true end end)
